args.natural_language_statement: Let f : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù be a function which is differentiable for every x > 0, and assume f' (the derivative) tends to 0 as x ‚Üí +‚àû. Define g(x) = f(x+1) - f(x). import Mathlib

open Filter

theorem Rudin_exercise_5_5 (f : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù) (h_diff : DifferentiableOn ‚Ñù f (Ioi 0))
  (h_deriv : Tendsto (fun x => deriv f x) atTop (ùìù 0)) :
  Tendsto (fun x => f (x + 1) - f x) atTop (ùìù 0) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

open Filter Set

theorem Rudin_exercise_5_5 (f : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù) (h_diff : DifferentiableOn ‚Ñù f (Set.Ioi (0 : ‚Ñù)))
  (h_deriv : Tendsto (fun x => deriv f x) atTop (ùìù (0 : ‚Ñù))) :
  Tendsto (fun x => f (x + 1) - f x) atTop (ùìù (0 : ‚Ñù)) := by
